item.description:
The American Alpine Club sponsors a BBQ on the first Tuesday of June, July, and August. The event is free and open to anyone. Bring your bouldering gear / anything you want to throw on the grill!

No alcohol please!

Last month's meetup was a success with nearly two dozen people showing up from Rock and Ice Climbing Boston as well as the American Alpine Club!

Plenty of ropes will be dropped at lower wall in addition to a multitude of bouldering problems at the alcove!

Event will be cancelled in inclement weather.
item.name: Hammond Pond Summer BBQ and Bouldering
